info.title: Media Source List

mediasourcelist.name: mediasourcelist
mediasourcelist.description: This Resource provides the list of all media sources available on the Device (input and/or output). The sources are an array of mediaSource(s) as separately defined see Resource Type "oic. r. mediasource"

sourceName.name: source name
sourceName.description: Specifies a pre-defined media input or output.

sourceType.name: source type
sourceType.description: Specifies the type of the source.

status.name: status
status.description: Specifies if the specific source instance is selected or not.
